price: (Ana ce musu) "Ku ci, kuma ku sha a cikin ni'ima, sabõda abin da kuka gabãtar a cikin kwãnukan da suka shige."
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā aslaftum fī al-ayāmi al-khāliyati
